items.name: DFOnline.dev
items.description: Drag & drop system to view, share and edit code templates.

items.name: Raw Code Template Manipulation
items.description: Full control over code templates, but harder to do.

items.name: DFPrismarine
items.description: Create code templates using JavaScript inside your browser.

items.name: DFblocc
items.description: Code templates made with a scratch-like editor.

items.name: vmd2df
items.description: Create armor stand code from vmd files.

items.name: pyre
items.description: Create code templates using Python inside your favorite IDE.

items.name: DFBlock (Python)
items.description: A DiamondFire Type Interface, coded in Python.

items.name: McDFPy
items.description: A python library to create code for DiamondFire.

items.name: Blackstone
items.description: A programming language designed for DiamondFire.

items.name: FrozenJade
items.description: A custom low-level programming language that can be converted to DiamondFire Templates and back(WIP). Created with antlr4.

items.name: recode
items.description: Maintained CodeUtilities 2.0 fork.

items.name: LessUtilities
items.description: A couple utilities from CodeUtilities 2.0.

items.name: DFScript
items.description: A revival of the CodeUtilities scripting feature.

items.name: CodeClient
items.description: An in development mod with large changes to optimize how you code. From the devs of DFOnline.

name: Misc
description: More things that don't fit in the categories above

items.name: DFSchematics
items.description: Tool to import schematic files into DiamondFire.

items.name: DF Spigotifier
items.description: Convert DiamondFire template into Spigot plugins.

items.name: DiamondFire Tools
items.description: A collection of web-tools for the DiamondFire Minecraft server. Create stylized text for DiamondFire text values. View a filterable list of DiamondFire commands.

items.name: dfplots.net
items.description: You can claim any subdomain of dfplots.net to host a site for your DiamondFire plot.

items.name: DiamondFireWithShaders
items.description: DiamondFireWithShaders is a gallery of images of DiamondFire node spawns with cool shaders.

name: Deprecated
description: Mods and similar that are no longer supported by DiamondFire or have stopped working.

items.name: CodeUtilities 3.0
items.description: Scripting with some other minor utilities.

items.name: CodeUtilities 2.0
items.description: Feature packed with utilities.

properties.Deprecated: DF no longer supports this Minecraft version.

items.name: Sparkscript
items.description: Create code templates using JavaScript inside your favorite IDE.

items.name: JFDF
items.description: Create code templates using Java.
